name: Wollahyde
text: Oof.^9 Seems the market is crashing. Hopefully you have a good Put contract or didn't invest too heavily -- nothing but a heavy market shakeup will yield any kind of profit.

name: Wollahyde
text: Focus on minimizing your losses as best as you can.^9 On the plus side, buying PdB down the line should be very cheap!
